name: SpiderSim: escape from lockdown
description:
Spider Sim: Escape from lockdown

"Once an animatronic, S9-1 D3-7 grew alone in the walls of a single room. Lockdown meant that no one ever came by for him to exert his true potential anymore, especially so close to Halloween. Usually he would be stalking distressed people through an attraction aimed to strike fear in its customers, but now, all was silent. Slowly but surely, S9-1 D3-7 began to force against his program, he should still be locked in place in the store room but instead, he is scurrying around.

Help him find a way out"
